text: On hangom, ki did, ki namexurand, pas dar dilas az onho tarse joft. Guftand (ʙarojas): «Matars!» Mo pajomʙaroni Alloh hastem. Va uro ʙa pisare dono ʙasorat dodand, ki hamsari u Sora ʙarojas tavallud mekunad va cun ʙa haddi mardi merasad, ongoh ʙisjor dono va ogoh az ilmi ilohi mesavad va u Ishoq alajhissalom ast
